FuncDef:
The dns-server command sets the IP address of a DNS server for a DNS test instance.
The undo dns-server command deletes the IP address of a DNS server. The dns-server command sets the IP address of a DNS server for a DNS test instance. The undo dns-server command deletes the IP address of a DNS server. By default, no IP address is configured for a DNS server.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies an IPv4 address for a DNS server.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

ExtraInfo: A DNS test instance detects the speed at which a DNS name is resolved to an IP address. It clearly reflects the performance of the DNS protocol on the network.
